select count(*) from blockinformation where substr(df_idNumber,1,8) = substr(#{df_idNumber},1,8) and substr(df_idNumber,13,3) = substr(#{df_idNumber},13,3)
mapper.insert: insert into blockinformation(df_idNumber, df_pictureName, df_material, df_size, df_usage, df_form, df_manufacture, df_itemStatus, df_moveStatus, note, login_area) values (#{addBlockForm.df_idNumber}, #{addBlockForm.df_pictureName}, #{addBlockForm.df_material}, #{addBlockForm.df_size}, #{addBlockForm.df_usage}, #{addBlockForm.df_form}, #{addBlockForm.df_manufacture}, #{addBlockForm.df_itemStatus}, #{addBlockForm.df_moveStatus}, #{addBlockForm.note}, #{searchArea})
mapper.update: update blockinformation set df_idNumber = #{df_idNumber}, df_pictureName = #{df_pictureName}, df_material = #{df_material}, df_size = #{df_size}, df_usage = #{df_usage}, df_form = #{df_form}, df_manufacture = #{df_manufacture}, df_itemStatus = #{df_itemStatus}, df_moveStatus = #{df_moveStatus}, note = #{note} where df_num = #{df_num}
mapper.insert: insert into blockMoveList(moveList_lender, moveList_recipient, moveList_recipient_area, df_itemStatus, df_idNumber, login_area, login_id, note) select #{moveBlock.moveList_lender}, #{moveBlock.moveList_recipient}, #{moveBlock.moveList_recipient_area}, df_itemStatus, #{moveBlock.df_idNumber}, #{login_area}, #{login_id}, #{moveBlock.note} from blockInformation where df_idNumber = #{moveBlock.df_idNumber}
mapper.select: select df_idNumber from blockMoveList where moveList_recipient_area = #{searchArea} and moveList_return_date is null and YN = 'Y'
mapper.update: update blockInformation a set df_itemStatus = '사용중', df_moveStatus = '-' where df_idNumber = #{df_idNumber}
update blockMoveList set df_itemStatus = '사용중', moveList_return_date = now() where df_idNumber = #{df_idNumber}
